title: Ghiblies
synopsis: Two Ghibli created shorts about the happenings in a fictional animation studio, presumably based to some extent on their own.
staff: [['Momose, Yoshiyuki', ['Director', ' Screenplay']], ['Tanabe, Osamu', ['Storyboard', ' Key Animation']], ['Suzuki, Toshio', ['Production Manager']], ['Ohira, Shinya', ['Key Animation']]]
